Create a virtual reality simulation of the impacts of climate change on coastal communities, allowing researchers and policymakers to visualize and experience the effects of rising sea levels, increased storm intensity, and more frequent flooding.

Develop a machine learning algorithm that can analyze satellite imagery and other data sources to identify areas of deforestation and land degradation, enabling researchers to track the impact of climate change on ecosystems and biodiversity.

Create a citizen science platform that allows members of the public to contribute to climate change research by collecting and sharing data on local weather patterns, air quality, and other environmental factors.
Develop a mobile app that uses artificial intelligence to provide personalized climate change advice to individuals based on their location, lifestyle, and consumption habits.
